definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: I can happily say I've been off drugs for nearly a year now.
sentences.chinese: 我可以兴奋地说我此刻快一年没有沾过福寿膏了。

sentences.english: Sorry. Mr. Green can't see you now.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，格林师长教师此刻不能见您。

sentences.english: Mama was the best helper a boy ever had.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈是一个男孩此刻能找到的最好帮手了。

sentences.english: The point of goal-setting is to improve the quality of the present.
sentences.chinese: 设定目标的关键点是提升你此刻处理事务的质量。

sentences.english: At the moment, very quiet night, the eighth floor rooftop terrace is a kiosk hospital.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，夜很静，八楼的楼顶，阳台就是一小亭院。

sentences.english: I'm anxious to go back home as I've been away for a very long time.
sentences.chinese: 我已经好久没有回家了，此刻真是归心似箭。

sentences.english: It is now the standard of living increased, many people have pets.
sentences.chinese: 此刻人们糊涎水平提高了，人们都养宠物。

sentences.english: But she had come this far, she wasn't going to back out now.
sentences.chinese: 不过既然大老远跑来，绝不会此刻罢手。

sentences.english: Now, one family is sitting in front of the door to enjoy the cool, chat, full moon, eat moon cakes.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，一家人正坐在门前乘凉，聊天，望月，吃月饼。

sentences.english: We deeply appreciate Russia's expression of solidarity with India at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常感谢俄罗斯此时此刻对印度表达的团结精神。

sentences.english: John Lee is a some-stomvery single, alternativehough be was a nostomvery single two years past.
sentences.chinese: 李约翰此刻已是名人，固然两年前是台甫鼎鼎的。

sentences.english: According to Thoman, food waste and yard waste are currently all dumped in a pile together.
sentences.chinese: 托曼说，此刻食物垃圾和庭院销毁物都堆放在一路。

sentences.english: To conceal this moment with a radian already a wrinkled face sad.
sentences.chinese: 一抹弧度来掩饰此刻已皱起的一脸难过。

sentences.english: Now, I greatly admire Tom and he was become a good friend.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，我很是服气汤姆，我们成为了好伴侣。

sentences.english: He was at the moment finally realized that Qian Asan did not die.
sentences.chinese: 小秋此刻也终于意识到钱阿三根本没有死去。

sentences.english: Right now that target price has a modest but steady economic recovery as a major assumption.
sentences.chinese: 此刻这个目标价位如同总体想定一样，适度而平稳。

definition: an instant (Sanskrit: ksana)/split second/the twinkling of an eye
variant of 彷彿|仿佛[fang3 fu2]
one's whole heart/from the bottom of one's heart
